Package org.sdnplatform.sync.internal.remote

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RemoteStore
    A store implementation that will connect to a remote sync instance
    RemoteSyncChannelHandler
    Implement the client side of the RPC service for the RemoteSyncManager
    RemoteSyncChannelInitializer
    Pipeline factory for the remote sync service
    RemoteSyncFuture  
    RemoteSyncManager
    Implementation of a sync service that passes its functionality off to a remote sync manager over a TCP connection
    RSHandshakeTimeoutHandler
    Trigger a timeout if the bootstrap process stalls
    SyncReply
